welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Forks, where the rain adds to the charm of our picturesque town. Home to breathtaking natural beauty and the popular Twilight saga, we invite you to immerse yourself in our small-town charm and discover all that we have to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lehigh Valley International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lehigh Valley International Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Upper Bucks Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private flights and offers a more luxurious and personalized experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mt Pocono Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Mt Pocono Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Doylestown Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
